title: Cant get my 5th championship jewel
body: Cant get my 5th championship jewel ive gotten 4 in a row and i cant get me 5th on 4/10/16, is it cause i have to wait till day 5?

replies.body:
you can only buy jewels when Worlds is on.

Worlds is on Friday-Monday.

You can't currently purchase the next Championship Token because the next Worlds live broadcast is the day after tomorrow. The token purchases should be opened up sometime within the next 24 hours though! 

http://www.lolesports.com/en_AU/worlds/world_championship_2016/schedule/default
